channel.title: Whats goin on with these rsc servers!
channel.description: it seems like only server that is up is RSCE, all the other ones keep goin down! i wish a new server will open up and stay up for good!

item.title: Whats goin on with these rsc servers!
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

I remember he spent countless hours doing everything for nothing.

His stuff is still on assembla, even the darscape website
https://www.assembla.com/code/dragon_annihilators/subversion/nodes

Read full topic

item.title: Whats goin on with these rsc servers!
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“Dustin Jr, post:5, topic:519125”][quote author=No Effn Lime link=topic=637586.msg4297544#msg4297544 date=1368476697]

it seems like only server that is up is RSCE, all the other ones keep goin down! i wish a new server will open up and stay up for good!

RSC Unlimited has been up for 4 months now…

rscunlimited.net
[/quote]

Board stats: 15424 users | 748 topics | 980 posts with actually like what 10 registered users that aren’t bots? And 1 person online, being the admin most likely. Server has been up for 4 months with 1 player online. Sounds promising.[/quote]

RSCU is always up when i try to log in, and hardly ever laggs, reaches up to 10 players sometimes more at times, just nobody really uses the site. Dont judge it until you play it.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats goin on with these rsc servers!

I wanna play Darscape.

Where did Marwolf ever run off to? I think that’s what his name was lol.
[/quote]Cleako/Marwolf/Brett lol, he left the RSC scene.

I remember he spent countless hours doing everything for nothing. Anyone know how I can contact the guy? :)[/quote]i have his msn

item.title: Whats goin on with these rsc servers!
item.dc:creator: @Dustin_Jr Dustin Jr
item.description:
@Dustin_Jr wrote:

[quote=“No Effn Lime, post:6, topic:519125”][quote author=Dustin Jr link=topic=637586.msg4297548#msg4297548 date=1368476791]

it seems like only server that is up is RSCE, all the other ones keep goin down! i wish a new server will open up and stay up for good!

RSC Unlimited has been up for 4 months now…

rscunlimited.net

Board stats: 15424 users | 748 topics | 980 posts with actually like what 10 registered users that aren’t bots? And 1 person online, being the admin most likely. Server has been up for 4 months with 1 player online. Sounds promising.
[/quote]

Why dont you try it and stop being a dickhead? Lol

Edit: Nvm i dont want you playing on this server, forget i said anything[/quote]
I’ve played it, and i’m not being a dick head, if he can’t even stop the bots from registering on his site, why would anyone even want to try it? Along with he doesn’t even have a dedi.

Read full topic
